name: Edge of Night (presidentbeef)
description:
Find your way in the darkness... but you don't have much time!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • <space> to interact or pick up items
  • <L>etter keys to use items

Only one level... for now!

This game is inspired by the DragonRuby TeenyTiny Game Jam.

Sounds from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Art:

  • https://szadiart.itch.io/rpg-main-character
  • https://pellaore.itch.io/16x16-castle-and-wall-ruins-in-the-forest
  • https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic
  • https://beast-pixels.itch.io/crafting-materials
  • https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-gui-construction-kit-v10
